mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopuser (userName, userPhone, userPassword, userWallet, isAdmin, loginTime) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userPassword}, #{userWallet}, #{isAdmin}, #{loginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT userId, userName, userPhone, userPassword, userWallet, loginTime, isAdmin FROM shopuser WHERE userName = #{userName} AND userPassword = #{userPassword}
mapper.update: UPDATE shopuser SET loginTime = #{loginTime} WHERE userName = #{userName}
